hero.name: Ionuț Stănculea
hero.title: Cloud & Operations Engineer building reliable infrastructure with care and precision
hero.description: Passionate about creating scalable, secure cloud solutions that empower teams and delight users. Currently architecting hybrid cloud environments at Electronic Arts.

about.title: Profile
about.subtitle: Cloud & Operations Engineer building reliable infrastructure with care and precision
about.paragraph1: I'm a passionate Cloud & Operations Engineer with over 5 years of hands-on experience building, managing, and automating scalable infrastructure on Azure and AWS. Currently at Electronic Arts, I specialize in hybrid cloud environments and platform reliability that keeps teams productive and users happy.
about.paragraph2: My approach combines deep technical expertise with genuine care for the people using these systems. Whether it's reducing incidents by 25% or solving complex infrastructure puzzles, I believe the best solutions are both robust and elegant.
about.paragraph3: When I'm not optimizing cloud infrastructure, you'll find me tinkering with smart home gadgets, 3D printing fun prototypes, or exploring the latest cloud technologies.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.subtitle: Building and scaling infrastructure across different industries and technologies

ea.title: Cloud Operations Engineer
achievements: Managed and optimized hybrid cloud infrastructure combining on-premises systems with AWS and Azure services
Implemented CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure automation using Terraform and Jenkins
Monitored system health and performance using Grafana and Prometheus, reducing incident response time
Collaborated with development teams to ensure reliable deployments and platform stability

autodesk.title: Senior Quality Assurance Analyst
achievements: Led quality assurance efforts for enterprise software products
Developed and maintained automated testing frameworks using Selenium
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve software defects
Mentored junior QA analysts and established testing best practices

altenLead.title: Support Team Lead
achievements: Led a team of support engineers providing technical assistance for enterprise clients
Streamlined support processes and improved ticket resolution times
Coordinated with development teams to escalate and resolve complex technical issues
Trained team members on new technologies and support procedures

altenEngineer.title: Support Engineer
achievements: Provided technical support for enterprise software applications
Diagnosed and resolved complex technical issues for clients
Created technical documentation and knowledge base articles
Collaborated with development teams to improve product quality

expleo.title: Mechanical Design Engineer (Part-time)
achievements: Created mechanical designs using CATIA V5 and AutoCAD
Collaborated with engineering teams on product development projects
Prepared technical documentation and design specifications
